news.title: 爱泼斯坦文件惊现安德鲁王子争议照片
news.title0: Photos released in Epstein files appear to show Andrew on all fours over female
news.content: 美国司法部最新公布的爱泼斯坦文件中，包含安德鲁·蒙巴顿-温莎跪在一名女性身上的照片，引发对其与爱泼斯坦关系的进一步审查。
news.content0: Photographs appearing to show Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor kneeling on all fours over a female lying on the ground have been included in the latest batch of Epstein files released by the US Department of Justice.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 梅拉尼娅纪录片揭示第一夫人私密生活
news.title0: What we learned - and didn't - from the Melania documentary
news.content: 梅拉尼娅·特朗普参与制作的纪录片上映，展示其从私生活到第一夫人的心路历程，但回避了大部分政治议题。
news.content0: From televised cabinet meetings to late night Truth Social posts, US President Donald Trump has rarely stepped out of the spotlight since he resumed office in January.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 加拿大保守党领袖博励治成功连任
news.title0: Canada's Poilievre re-elected Conservative party leader
news.content: 皮埃尔·博励治在党内领导层审查中获得高票支持，成功连任加拿大保守党领袖，将继续带领该党备战下届大选。
news.content0: Pierre Poilievre has been re-elected as Canada's Conservative Party leader, having received a strong endorsement from members despite presiding over recent electoral defeats.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 好莱坞众星悼念喜剧演员凯瑟琳·欧哈拉
news.title0: Pedro Pascal and Meryl Streep lead tributes to Catherine O'Hara
news.content: 曾主演《小鬼当家》《富家穷路》的艾美奖得主凯瑟琳·欧哈拉去世，享年71岁，梅丽尔·斯特里普等众多明星发文悼念。
news.content0: Meryl Streep, Pedro Pascal and Ben Stiller are among celebrities to have paid tribute to Emmy-winning comedic actress Catherine O'Hara, who died on Friday aged 71.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 美国联邦政府再次部分停摆
news.title0: US government partially shuts down despite last minute funding deal
news.content: 美国参议院虽达成临时拨款协议，但众议院休会未及表决，导致联邦政府于周六凌晨部分停摆。
news.content0: The US federal government has partially shutdown despite a last-ditch funding deal approved by the Senate.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 前CNN主播莱蒙因教堂抗议报道被捕并遭指控
news.title0: Former CNN host Don Lemon charged in anti-ICE protest at Minnesota church
news.content: 前CNN主播唐·莱蒙因报道明尼苏达州教堂反移民执法抗议活动被捕，面临“剥夺权利共谋”等联邦指控。
news.content0: Former CNN host Don Lemon has appeared before a judge after being arrested for entering a Minnesota church and filming anti-immigration enforcement protesters as they disrupted a service.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 亚马逊宣布新一轮大规模裁员
news.title0: Amazon’s layoffs are staggering. We’ve seen this before
news.content: 亚马逊宣布将再裁员1.6万人，这是其近期第二轮大规模裁员，科技行业组织变革与裁员潮持续。
news.content0: Big Tech continues to wrestle with mass layoffs, most recently with Amazon’s announcement to slash 16,000 jobs. It’s a trend that started long before the AI race: organizational change brought by the arrival of new technology.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 韩国前第一夫人因收受奢侈品贿赂获刑
news.title0: How a love of luxury brought down South Korea’s former first lady
news.content: 韩国前总统尹锡悦的妻子金建希因收受名牌包等奢侈品贿赂，在一项审判中被判处一年零八个月监禁。
news.content0: It all started with adesigner handbag. Then two, then a luxury necklace, and more.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 科学家钻探南极冰川以研究其底部融化
news.title0: Drilling Is Underway to Examine Antarctica’s Melting Ice From Below
news.content: 英韩科学家团队开始钻探南极思韦茨冰川，以研究其底部暖洋流导致的融化情况，评估其对海平面上升的威胁。
news.content0: To peer into the future of one of Antarctica’s largest and fastest-shrinking glaciers, scientists on Wednesday began piercing a deep hole through its icy core.
news.author: NYTimes
